title: SHOW SHARES IN FAILOVER GROUP | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Requires Business Critical Edition (or higher). To inquire about upgrading, please contact Snowflake Support.
Lists shares in a failover group.
Specifies the identifier for the failover group.

Executing this command requires a role with either the OWNERSHIP or MONITOR privilege on the failover group. The command
returns results only for a role with the MONITOR privilege on a share.
To retrieve the list of failover groups in your organization, use SHOW FAILOVER GROUPS.
